basics.name: Muhammad Agiza
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Backend Software Engineer with an Electronics & Communication Engineering background, skilled in Node.js and REST API development. Passionate about problem-solving and technology.
basics.full_summary: Electronics & Communication Engineering graduate with demonstrated experience as a Backend Software Engineer. Proficient in designing and developing robust REST APIs with Node.js, integrating databases like MySQL and Firebase, and applying SOLID principles within Agile environments. Passionate about leveraging technology to build scalable SaaS solutions and solve complex challenges.

courses: Built a strong foundation in electrical engineering principles, digital systems, and communications.
Developed expertise in electronics, circuit design, and microprocessor applications.
Applied simulation, modeling, and testing techniques to real-world electrical systems.
Strengthened problem-solving skills through digital and analog circuit analysis projects.
Enhanced technical communication and teamwork through collaborative engineering projects.

highlights: Designed and developed robust REST APIs leveraging Node.js, integrating with databases like MySQL and Firebase to enhance backend system stability and functionality.
Applied SOLID principles in daily backend development tasks, contributing to more maintainable and higher-quality code.
Actively participated within Agile development methodologies, contributing to improved team workflow and project adaptability.
Utilized Continuous Integration (CI) pipelines as part of the development process to help streamline deployments.
Contributed significantly to the backend development and scaling of various Software as a Service (SaaS) solutions across E-Learning, Real-estate, and e-commerce industries.

certifications.title: Cisco Certified Network Associate (CCNA v7)
highlights: Gained practical networking experience using Cisco Packet Tracer and remote labs to configure routers, switches, and core network protocols.
Mastered core networking concepts including IPv4/IPv6 addressing, VLANs, ACLs, NAT, and WAN technologies.
